sentence.Network_en: Comprehension declines in speed reading that exceeds those physical limitations.
sentence.Network_cn: 在速读中理解会下降,而理解力的作用超越了生理的那些限制.

sentence.Network_en: Speed Read - Speed reading isn't about going faster, but controlling your tempo.
sentence.Network_cn: 速读 —— 速读不是一味的读快, 而是要适当的控制你的阅读节奏.

sentence.Network_en: Front page also bears the ability to preview and speed reading, number of sections.
sentence.Network_cn: 头版还承担着预览和速读的功能, 稿件数量并不多.
